chunk:
Absolute Joi Balancing PH Toner (2020 formulation)

Brand: AbsoluteJOI

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aloe Vera (Aloe Barbadensis) Leaf Juice, Water (Aqua), Saccharide Isomerate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Oat (Avena Sativa) Kernel Extract, Sclerotium Gum, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Potassium Sorbate, Sor

tassium Sorbate, Sorbic Acid

Directions: Dispense 2-3 pumps into clean, dry hands.
Gently massage into your clean face.
Let dry.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
